title: Leaked Credentials from Internal System
description: Credentials from internal systems have been leaked, potentially due to a phishing campaign targeting employees. The leak includes usernames and passwords for internal.corp and sample.org domains.

affected_systems.name: Primary Authentication Server
affected_systems.impact: Potential unauthorized access using leaked credentials

affected_systems.name: Related Databases
affected_systems.impact: Potential data exfiltration and unauthorized access

mitigations: Immediate password rotation for all affected users
Monitor network traffic for unusual activity
Check logs for access patterns related to leaked credentials
